md:
giải nghĩa từ "costly" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

costly (adjective)

* Meaning: expensive; requiring a lot of money or effort
* Vietnamese: đắt đỏ, tốn kém

Example sentence: The new smartphone is quite costly, so I'll have to save up for a few months to buy it.

Related words: expensive, pricey, costly, high-priced

Antonyms: cheap, affordable, inexpensive

Note: Costly can also mean requiring a lot of effort or sacrifice, not just money. For example: "The project was costly in terms of time and resources."

  • Vietnamese: đắt đỏ, tốn kém

Antonyms: cheap, affordable, inexpensive

Note: Costly can also mean requiring a lot of effort or sacrifice, not just money. For example: "The project was costly in terms of time and resources."
